reviews.review_content:
Graeme, an affable, acid-tongued, chain-smoking Brit, took over a significant portion of the class while Terry Pender was in the hospital. I found him to be a terrific teacher, laid-back yet super-organized, and I learned more about mixing music from him in just a few weeks than I ever thought there was to know. Terry rocks too, so I'm not that sad about Graeme leaving, but I do hope Columbia continues to put his considerable teaching ability to good use.
Workload:
At your own pace.
